action.name: Variant: New Giant Options
text: Some adult fire giants are trained to lay siege to strongholds and break through enemy lines. These abilities are represented by the following traits.
Siege Monster. Tartha deals double damage to objects and structures.
Tackle. When Tartha enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
